hero.name: Arya Pradana,
hero.scroll: Scroll down to see the portfolio
about.title: Front End Engineer with 1+ years of professional experience and core contributor to Infinix's product suite, including USP pages, xclub, and xpark platforms. Currently working full-stack with active development on 2sweet.ai—an AI-powered platform for preserving memories, creating family trees, and hosting memorial events.
about.description: Actively expanding into Back-End development. Linux enthusiast with a passion for open-source technologies. When not coding, I'm playing guitar and bass.
about.current_job: Currently working as Front-End Engineer at Summit Global Technology.
porto.title: Recent projects and contributions

porto.projects.title: Buku Resepku
porto.projects.description: A web-based cookbook catalog application with integrated recipe browsing functionality. Developed to fulfill the Capstone Project requirements for SIB Batch 3 - Dicoding Academy.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: My very first project in my programming life.

porto.projects.title: Shopper
porto.projects.description: A frontend ecommerce simulation featuring buyer-seller interactions and marketplace-style product management.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: My first framework project. I choose ReactJS and Bootstrap to learn how framework works.

porto.projects.title: Arya's Portfolio Website (old)
porto.projects.description: A modern, light-themed personal website showcasing Arya Pradana’s profile, skills, and front-end development projects in a sleek, interactive one-page design.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: My old portfolio website, used as reference.

porto.projects.title: Note 40 Racing Edition Series
porto.projects.description: Developed a responsive landing page for the Infinix Note 40 Racing Edition Series (including Note 40, Note 40 Pro, Note 40 Pro+, Note 40 5G, and Note 40 Pro+ 5G variant), featuring ScrollMagic scroll animations, Swiper.js carousels and custom interactive UI.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: My first professional project: a landing page for a limited-edition campaign. The page is no longer live; the image is from the ID website’s KV.

porto.projects.title: Note 40 Series
porto.projects.description: Maintained and optimized the Note 40 Series landing pages (Note 40, Note 40 Pro, Note 40 Pro 5G, Note 40 Pro+ 5G, Note 40S), improving performance by 15–20% through ScrollMagic render-frame enhancements and asynchronous rendering.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: The site’s ScrollMagic frame-render system triggers frame changes on scroll, delivering a smooth, movie-like immersive experience.

porto.projects.title: Zero 40 Series
porto.projects.description: Maintained and optimized the Note 40 Series landing pages (Note 40, Note 40 Pro, Note 40 Pro 5G, Note 40 Pro+ 5G, Note 40S), improving performance by 15–20% through ScrollMagic render-frame enhancements and asynchronous rendering.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: The site’s ScrollMagic frame-render system triggers frame changes on scroll, delivering a smooth, movie-like immersive experience.

skills.title: ReactJS, NextJS & TypeScript
skills.detail: Advanced proficiency in React ecosystem including hooks, context API, and component lifecycle. Experienced with Next.js for SSR/SSG, TypeScript for type safety, and modern state management (Redux, Zustand). Skilled in performance optimization, code splitting, and building scalable enterprise applications.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.description: Front End Engineer with 1+ years of experience in Vue/React ecosystems, specializing in Nuxt.js and Next.js frameworks. Proficient in Magento development, REST API integration, and object-oriented programming. While focusing on front-end, actively learning and developing backend using PHP and JavaScript. Daily experience with design tools including Figma, Adobe XD, and Photoshop for UI/UX implementation.

experience.positions.title: Front-End Developer
experience.positions.description: Developed seasonal gaming event platforms (PMGC, PMSL, HOK Invitational), XClub community websites, and business intelligence dashboards utilizing Vue.js and ANTDesign. Maintained XPARK and InfiniixMobility e-commerce platforms on Magento framework, utilized PHP and MySQL for backend. Integrated with Next.js that allows users to create conversational experiences with deceased individuals using personal data. Implemented transaction concurrency through Midtrans and managed digital persona using the 2Sweet project.

experience.positions.title: Junior Front-End Developer
experience.positions.description: Developed and maintained landing pages (USP) for Infinix product lines including smartphones, tablets, and TWS devices using Vue.js framework. Led a comprehensive code optimization initiative, transforming functional programming architecture into a highly OOP-oriented object-oriented structure, improving code maintainability and scalability. Promoted to Project Leader for technical supervision and led team coordination for landing page projects.

experience.positions.title: Front-End Developer Intern
experience.positions.description: Lead and managed a team of 4 developers in a Capstone Project, creating a recipe catalog, blog, and discussion forum 'Buku Resepku'. Developed front-end architecture by using - Attention to excellent features.

experience.positions.title: WordPress Developer
experience.positions.description: Developing a WordPress website to be used as a platform for promotion, information dissemination, and registration for Seminar purposes and Template.
